net.floodlightcontroller.northboundapi.server
Class NBServerSSLSupport

java.lang.Object
  net.floodlightcontroller.northboundapi.server.NBServerSSLSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
NBServerSocketCreator
public class NBServerSSLSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements NBServerSocketCreator

SSL support claass for abstract listener service.

This class uses northbound API configuration parameter settings to identify and access the various certificate data required to establish and use an SSL context object. If access to any component required by the configuration settings fails, the SSL listener socket will not be created. For example, if client authentication is specified but the trust management data cannot be loaded, then no SSL listener will be established.

If the northbound API is to establish an SSL listener port, the key store containing the public/private certificate key pair that identifies the server must be provided (specified via the northbound API configuration parameters that begin with "SSL_SERVER_KS_"). If the server is also to perform client SSL authentication, the public root certificates that identify the certificate authorities (or client self-signed public certificates if no certificate authority is used) that comprise the server's trust management set must be provided (specified via the northbound API configuration parameters that begin with "SSL_SERVER_TM_").

The following table lists the configuration parameters used directly by the NBServerSSLSupport class:
Configuration Parameter Name Data Type Default Description
"SSL_SERVER_ADDRESS" string Same as plain listener "LISTEN_ADDRESS" setting. The IP address or host name to bind the SSL listen socket to.
"SSL_SERVER_BACKLOG" integer Same as plain listener "LISTEN_BACKLOG" setting. The maximum connection backlog count.
"SSL_SERVER_PORT" integer NBAPICommonConstants.DefaultNBServerPortSSL (34029) The port number to bind the SSL listen socket to.
"SSL_SERVER_PROTOCOL" string "TLS" Protocol name for the SSLContext.getInstance() method.
"SSL_SERVER_CLIENT_AUTHENTICATE" boolean false Determines if server requires client authentication.
"SSL_SERVER_KS_ALGORITHM" string KeyManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm() Server (public/private pair) key store algorithm.
"SSL_SERVER_KS_PATH" file path None. Server (public/private pair) key store file path.
"SSL_SERVER_KS_PWD" string None. Server (public/private pair) key store file password.
"SSL_SERVER_KS_TYPE" string Path sensitive. Server (public/private pair) key store file type.
"SSL_SERVER_TM_ALGORITHM" string TrustManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm() Server trust management key store algorithm.
"SSL_SERVER_TM_PATH" file path None. Server trust management key store path.
"SSL_SERVER_TM_PWD" string None. Server trust management key store password.
"SSL_SERVER_TM_TYPE" string Path sensitive. Server trust management key store file type.
